snippet: Dr. Brimmer, hailed for his international monetary policy expertise, was concerned with the economic conditions of poor blacks.
abstract: Andrew Brimmer, first black member of the Federal Reserve Board and who led efforts to reverse America's balance-of-payments deficit, dies at age 86.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Brimmer, hailed for his international monetary policy expertise, was concerned with the economic conditions of poor blacks.

headline.seo: Andrew Brimmer, First Black Member on Fed Board, Dies at 86
headline.main: Andrew Brimmer, First Black Member on Fed Board, Dies at 86
headline.print_headline: Andrew Brimmer, 86, First Black on Fed
